Title: Relates to the registration of limited use motorcycles
Summary: Requires all limited use motorcycles sold in the State of New York be registered; relates to registration fees; authorizes the commissioner of motor vehicles to promulgate regulations.
LawCode: Amd ยง415, add ยง2267-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring that all limited use motorcycles sold in the state of New York be registered
